meanings.definition: A salt or ester of nitrous acid, containing the anion NO2-.
meanings.sent1: The chef used nitrites to preserve the meat.
meanings.sent2: The laboratory tested the water for nitrites.
meanings.sent3: The nitrites in the food made it last longer than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening was like the nitrites, preserving the beauty of the flowers.
meanings.sent5: The smell of nitrites lingered in the air, reminding him of the chemistry experiment.
